application

Class SparqlController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.SparqlController

  • public class SparqlController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles communication via SPARQL and via GET-Requests (for WikiData). Used for retrieving possible answers and for validation.

    • Method Detail

      • queryList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> queryList(Category category,
                                                         char initialChar)
        Tets an endpoint (DBPedia, WikiData...), the initial Char and the Category as input 1. Gets query string from Settings.java 2. Get endpoint for category 3. replaces placeholder in query string with initial char 4. retrieves results
        Parameters:
        category - desired Category
        initialChar - starting char for the result set
        Returns:
        List

      • queryDBPedia

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> queryDBPedia(Category category,
                                                            java.lang.String initialChar)
        Queries DBPedia for a certain category and an initial char
        Parameters:
        category - desired Category
        initialChar - starting char for resultset
        Returns:
        List

      • validateAnswer

        public static boolean validateAnswer(Answer answer)
        Validation method for answers. First checks whether the answer's text is empty or equal to null. Validates with ASK or with ASK and SELECT depending on whether the flag validateWithAskAndSelect has been set.
        Parameters:
        answer - Answer instance
        Returns:
        boolean whether the answer is correct or not

      • validateWithAsk

        public static boolean validateWithAsk(Answer answer)
        Validates a given answer with the use of an ASK query.
        Parameters:
        answer - Answer instance
        Returns:
        boolean whether the answer is correct or not.

      • validateWithSelect

        public static boolean validateWithSelect(Answer answer)
        Validates a given answer with a select query.
        Parameters:
        answer - Answer instance
        Returns:
        boolean whether the answer is correct or not.

        Parameters:
